p: In addition to TC trajectories, we also consider the return period of TC wind speed at the Battery for two subsets of models. Fig. S6 A shows the mean return period of TC wind speed during both the modern and future eras at the Battery for the core models and indicates very little difference between the two time periods. Fig. S6 B shows the mean return period of TC wind speed during both the modern and future eras at the Battery for the combination of the core models and additional models. Using this larger set of models, Fig. S6 B indicates a possible increase in wind speed at the Battery in future simulations, although this increase is of doubtful significance.
